response.overview: In the summer of 2022, I attended a film festival where I found myself attracted to a girl, after discovering many merits of hers. Despite knowing she had a boyfriend, the sneaky, happy feelings drove me to make the story into a film – my gratuitous confidence – for the desire to document this special time I had. So, this short documentary film was born. It ultimately has become a process of confronting myself, and of embarrassment by expressing my emotions.
response.title: 看见
